short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tool to help creatives to sell their content efficiently.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tool to help you sell your creative content on creativemarket.com

- Explore your competition, by looking into information about tags they have used or when they update their product.
- Collect tags by clicking on them and easily paste them when adding your product.

Send me a feedback if you want more features added, have suggestions or you simply want to tell me if the extension is helpful to you.

From version 1.0.3 you can view hidden information such as views, like and favorites for competition analysis. Your stored information stays on your device and will synchronise between your browsers.
